title: Toward the Restart of Ikata-3, Prime Minister Abe Stresses Government Responsibility in Nuclear Disasters (JAIF ...
text: ( Source : JAIF - Japan Atomic Industrial Forum Inc) 8 October, 2015 Noriyuki Ishii At an October 6 meeting of Japan 's Nuclear Emergency Council , headed by Prime Minister Shinzo Abe , a report was presented on emergency responses in the region
